alerts.reason: Suspicious invoice with nonsensical content, personal email domain, and future date
alerts.summary: This email appears highly suspicious as it claims to be an invoice but contains only gibberish text 'erripu.' with no legitimate invoice information. The sender uses a personal Gmail account rather than a business domain, and the email is dated in the future (2026), which suggests potential system manipulation or fraud.

factors.title: Personal Email Domain
factors.description: Sender uses Gmail personal account instead of business domain for invoice

factors.title: Nonsensical Content
factors.description: Email body contains only gibberish text 'erripu.' with no invoice information

factors.title: Future Date
factors.description: Email dated February 2026, which is in the future and suspicious

factors.title: Missing Invoice Details
factors.description: No amount, invoice number, company details, or payment information provided

alerts.reason: Extremely vague invoice content with no legitimate business details or financial information
alerts.summary: This email claims to be an invoice but contains only 'demo 1' as content with no financial details, amounts, or business information. The lack of any legitimate invoice elements combined with the unprofessional presentation suggests this is likely fraudulent or a test/spam message.

factors.title: Missing Invoice Details
factors.description: No invoice number, amount, services, dates, or payment terms provided

factors.title: Vague Content
factors.description: Body contains only 'demo 1' which provides no legitimate business context

factors.title: Unprofessional Format
factors.description: Legitimate invoices contain structured financial and business information
